column5: Hi All,  A few pals of mine have done the nippissing buzz the last few years for early ice in january but have decided to mix it up abit this year, can anyone here suggest a nice lake with some good fishing in the same area? we love our big fish, CPR for the most part. (don't mind a small fry every now and then)   any info in that area would be appreciated!  thanks!
Do you want a bungalow on the ice or just a cabin with a rental hut?  And do you have sleds?
hey, no sleds.  we have done both bungalow and cabin - pretty open to either.
